name: soliditytestingproject
description: - [] Testing `block.blobbasefee`: global function, retrieve the blob base fee of the current block. - [] Testing `blobhash(uint)`: global function, retrieving versioned hashes of blobs, akin to the homonymous Yul builtin. - [] Testing `blobbasefee()`: Yul builtin, retrieve the blob base fee of the current block. - [] Testing `blobhash()`: Yul builtin, retrieve the versioned hashes of blobs associated with the transaction. - [] Testing `mcopy()`: Yul builtin, cheaply copy data between memory areas. - [] Testing `tload()`and `tstore()`: Yul builtin, load and store data from transient storage.
